title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.7 - Out-of-state care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.7 - Out-of-state care

State Regulations

Out-of-state care will not be approved for State aid reimbursement unless specific exception is made by an authorized representative of the commissioner for just cause. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
45.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
